verses.verse: And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, Concerning the feasts <S%H4150><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall proclaim <S%H7121><s%> to be holy <S%H6944><s%> convocations, <S%H4744><s%> even these <S%H428><s%> are my feasts. <S%H4150><s%>

Six <S%H8337><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> shall work <S%H4399><s%> be done: <S%H6213><s%> but the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of rest, <S%H7677><s%> an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation; <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> therein: it is the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> are the feasts <S%H4150><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> even holy <S%H6944><s%> convocations, <S%H4744><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall proclaim <S%H7121><s%> in their seasons. <S%H4150><s%>
In the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day of the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> at <S%H996><s%> even <S%H6153><s%> is the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> passover. <S%H6453><s%>

And on the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the same <S%H2088><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> is the feast <S%H2282><s%> of unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you must eat <S%H398><s%> unleavened <S%H4682><s%> bread.

In the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> you shall have <S%H1961><s%> an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation: <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> therein.

But you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> is an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation: <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> therein.
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> to them, When <S%H3588><s%> you be come <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I give <S%H5414><s%> to you, and shall reap <S%H7114><s%> the harvest <S%H7105><s%> thereof, then you shall bring <S%H935><s%> a sheaf <S%H6016><s%> of the first fruits <S%H7225><s%> of your harvest <S%H7105><s%> to the priest: <S%H3548><s%>

And he shall wave <S%H5130><s%> the sheaf <S%H6016><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> to be accepted <S%H7522><s%> for you: on the morrow <S%H4283><s%> after the sabbath <S%H7676><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall wave <S%H5130><s%> it.

And you shall offer <S%H6213><s%> that day <S%H3117><s%> when you wave <S%H5130><s%> the sheaf <S%H6016><s%> an he lamb <S%H3532><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish <S%H8549><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the meat offering <S%H4503><s%> thereof shall be two <S%H8147><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals of fine flour <S%H5560><s%> mingled <S%H1101><s%> with oil, <S%H8081><s%> an offering made by fire to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for a sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell: <S%H7381><s%> and the drink <S%H5262><s%> offering thereof shall be of wine, <S%H3196><s%> the fourth <S%H7243><s%> part of an hin. <S%H1969><s%>

And you shall eat <S%H398><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> bread, <S%H3899><s%> nor parched <S%H7039><s%> corn, nor green ears, <S%H3759><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the selfsame <S%H2088><s%> <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that you have brought <S%H935><s%> an offering <S%H7133><s%> to your God: <S%H430><s%> it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>

And you shall count <S%H5608><s%> to you from the morrow <S%H4283><s%> after the sabbath, <S%H7676><s%> from the day <S%H3117><s%> that you brought <S%H935><s%> the sheaf <S%H6016><s%> of the wave <S%H8573><s%> offering; seven <S%H7651><s%> sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> shall be complete: <S%H8549><s%>

Even to the morrow <S%H4283><s%> after the seventh <S%H7637><s%> sabbath <S%H7676><s%> shall you number <S%H5608><s%> fifty <S%H2572><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> and you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> a new <S%H2319><s%> meat offering <S%H4503><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

You shall bring <S%H935><s%> out of your habitations <S%H4186><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> wave <S%H8573><s%> loaves <S%H3899><s%> of two <S%H8147><s%> tenth <S%H6241><s%> deals; they shall be of fine flour; <S%H5560><s%> they shall be baked <S%H644><s%> with leaven; <S%H2557><s%> they are the first fruits <S%H1061><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> with the bread <S%H3899><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> without <S%H8549><s%> blemish <S%H8549><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year, <S%H8141><s%> and one <S%H259><s%> young <S%H1121><s%> <S%H1241><s%> bullock, <S%H6499><s%> and two <S%H8147><s%> rams: <S%H352><s%> they shall be for a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> with their meat offering, <S%H4503><s%> and their drink <S%H5262><s%> offerings, even an offering made by fire, of sweet <S%H5207><s%> smell <S%H7381><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Then you shall sacrifice <S%H6213><s%> one <S%H259><s%> kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%> for a sin <S%H2403><s%> offering, and two <S%H8147><s%> lambs <S%H3532><s%> of the first <S%H1121><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> for a sacrifice <S%H2077><s%> of peace <S%H8002><s%> offerings.

And the priest <S%H3548><s%> shall wave <S%H5130><s%> them with the bread <S%H3899><s%> of the first fruits <S%H1061><s%> for a wave <S%H8573><s%> offering before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> with the two <S%H8147><s%> lambs: <S%H3532><s%> they shall be holy <S%H6944><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> for the priest. <S%H3548><s%>

And you shall proclaim <S%H7121><s%> on the selfsame <S%H2088><s%> <S%H6106><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> that it may be an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%> to you: you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> therein: it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your dwellings <S%H4186><s%> throughout your generations. <S%H1755><s%>

And when you reap <S%H7114><s%> the harvest <S%H7105><s%> of your land, <S%H776><s%> you shall not make clean <S%H2891><s%> riddance <S%H3615><s%> of the corners <S%H6285><s%> of your field <S%H7704><s%> when you reap, <S%H7114><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall you gather <S%H3950><s%> any gleaning <S%H3951><s%> of your harvest: <S%H7105><s%> you shall leave <S%H5800><s%> them to the poor, <S%H6041><s%> and to the stranger: <S%H1616><s%> I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> In the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> in the first <S%H259><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the month, <S%H2320><s%> shall you have <S%H1961><s%> a sabbath, <S%H7677><s%> a memorial <S%H2146><s%> of blowing <S%H8643><s%> of trumpets, an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation. <S%H4744><s%>
You shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> therein: but you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Also <S%H389><s%> on the tenth <S%H6218><s%> day of this <S%H2088><s%> seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> there shall be a day <S%H3117><s%> of atonement: <S%H3725><s%> it shall be an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%> to you; and you shall afflict <S%H6031><s%> your souls, <S%H5315><s%> and offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> in that same <S%H6106><s%> day: <S%H3117><s%> for it is a day <S%H3117><s%> of atonement, <S%H3725><s%> to make an atonement <S%H3722><s%> for you before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>

For whatever <S%H3605><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> it be that shall not be afflicted <S%H6031><s%> in that same <S%H6106><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> he shall be cut <S%H3772><s%> off from among his people. <S%H5971><s%>

And whatever <S%H3605><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> it be that does <S%H6213><s%> any <S%H3605><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> in that same <S%H6106><s%> day, <S%H3117><s%> the same <S%H6106><s%> soul <S%H5315><s%> will I destroy <S%H6><s%> from among <S%H7130><s%> his people. <S%H5971><s%>

You shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> manner of work: <S%H4399><s%> it shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> throughout your generations <S%H1755><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> your dwellings. <S%H4186><s%>

It shall be to you a sabbath <S%H7676><s%> of rest, <S%H7677><s%> and you shall afflict <S%H6031><s%> your souls: <S%H5315><s%> in the ninth <S%H8672><s%> day of the month <S%H2320><s%> at even, <S%H6153><s%> from even <S%H6153><s%> to even, <S%H6153><s%> shall you celebrate <S%H7673><s%> your sabbath. <S%H7676><s%>
And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Speak <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> The fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> seventh <S%H7637><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> shall be the feast <S%H2282><s%> of tabernacles <S%H5521><s%> for seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

On the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation: <S%H4744><s%> you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> therein.

Seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be an holy <S%H6944><s%> convocation <S%H4744><s%> to you; and you shall offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire to the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> it is a solemn <S%H6116><s%> assembly; <S%H6116><s%> and you shall do <S%H6213><s%> no <S%H3605><s%> <S%H3808><s%> servile <S%H5656><s%> work <S%H4399><s%> therein.

These <S%H428><s%> are the feasts <S%H4150><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> you shall proclaim <S%H7121><s%> to be holy <S%H6944><s%> convocations, <S%H4744><s%> to offer <S%H7126><s%> an offering made by fire to the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> a burnt <S%H5930><s%> offering, <S%H4503><s%> and a meat offering, a sacrifice, <S%H2077><s%> and drink <S%H5262><s%> offerings, every thing <S%H1697><s%> on his day: <S%H3117><s%>

Beside <S%H905><s%> the sabbaths <S%H7676><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and beside <S%H905><s%> your gifts, <S%H4979><s%> and beside <S%H905><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your vows, <S%H5088><s%> and beside <S%H905><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> your freewill <S%H5071><s%> offerings, which <S%H834><s%> you give <S%H5414><s%> to the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Also <S%H389><s%> in the fifteenth <S%H2568><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month, <S%H2320><s%> when you have gathered <S%H622><s%> in the fruit <S%H8393><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> you shall keep <S%H2287><s%> a feast <S%H2282><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days: <S%H3117><s%> on the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a sabbath, <S%H7677><s%> and on the eighth <S%H8066><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> shall be a sabbath. <S%H7677><s%>

And you shall take <S%H3947><s%> you on the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> the boughs <S%H6529><s%> of goodly <S%H1926><s%> trees, <S%H6086><s%> branches <S%H3709><s%> of palm <S%H8558><s%> trees, and the boughs <S%H6057><s%> of thick <S%H5687><s%> trees, <S%H6086><s%> and willows <S%H6155><s%> of the brook; <S%H5158><s%> and you shall rejoice <S%H8055><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God <S%H430><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days. <S%H3117><s%>

And you shall keep <S%H2287><s%> it a feast <S%H2282><s%> to the LORD <S%H3068><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> in the year. <S%H8141><s%> It shall be a statute <S%H2708><s%> for ever <S%H5769><s%> in your generations: <S%H1755><s%> you shall celebrate <S%H2287><s%> it in the seventh <S%H7637><s%> month. <S%H2320><s%>

You shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in booths <S%H5521><s%> seven <S%H7651><s%> days; <S%H3117><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that are Israelites <S%H3478><s%> born <S%H249><s%> shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in booths: <S%H5521><s%>

That your generations <S%H1755><s%> may know <S%H3045><s%> that I made the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to dwell <S%H3427><s%> in booths, <S%H5521><s%> when I brought <S%H3318><s%> them out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> I am the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God. <S%H430><s%>
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> declared <S%H1696><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> the feasts <S%H4150><s%> of the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>
